body:
Cards with accents or non-ascii characters are not being displayed in filter lists.

Originally reported by PalladiaMors http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&p=159615#p159604
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Cards missing from Set Filters

comments.body:
Just affected Alliances, other files converted too.

**Status:** Fixed

content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on September 01, 2014 23:15:29_

Cards with accents or non-ascii characters are not being displayed in filter lists.

Originally reported by PalladiaMors http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&p=159615#p159604
